description: Static semantic labels for ego graph metrics. Maps numerical ranges to human-readable phrases for UI display.

readability.conceptual_meaning: Measures how well a neighbor can understand and model the focal person's semantic interests based on ridge regression RÂ². Higher values indicate the neighbor understands what the focal person is about.

labels.label: doesn't get you
labels.description: No overlap in what you care about

labels.label: sort of gets you
labels.description: Knows the basics, not the details

labels.label: really gets you
labels.description: Knows exactly what you care about

overlap.conceptual_meaning: Jaccard index measuring shared neighbors between the focal person and a connection. High overlap means redundant networks (know same people), while low overlap means access to distinct social circles (structural holes).

labels.label: different worlds
labels.description: Opens up a whole new circle

labels.label: lots of overlap
labels.description: Know many of the same people

orientation_score.conceptual_meaning: Composite metric for strategic network navigation. Combines network exploration (low overlap), mutual understanding (legibility and attunement), semantic relevance (topical match), and reliability (stability). Higher scores indicate better candidates for next interaction.

public_legibility.conceptual_meaning: How well the network collectively reconstructs your semantic field from neighbors' embeddings. Higher values mean your interests are well-represented and predictable from your network.

labels.label: poor coverage
labels.description: Your network doesn't cover your interests

labels.label: good coverage
labels.description: Good coverage of your interests across your network

attention_entropy.conceptual_meaning: Shannon entropy of attention distribution across network clusters. Higher values indicate more evenly distributed attention; lower values indicate concentration in fewer clusters.

labels.label: pretty focused
labels.description: Mostly one or two main groups

labels.label: exploring broadly
labels.description: Talking to lots of different groups

subjective_attunement.conceptual_meaning: How well you can predict and understand this cluster's semantic interests from your own field. Higher values mean you grasp what matters to them.

labels.label: don't get them
labels.description: Have no idea what they care about

labels.label: sort of get them
labels.description: Basic sense of what they're into

labels.label: really get them
labels.description: Know what matters to this group

heat_residual_novelty.conceptual_meaning: Topological semantic distance between you and cluster after heat diffusion. Higher values mean the cluster operates in distinct semantic territory.
